verbs.description: [ARG1: sour cream fan] [V: rolls] i received this recipe from an email pen pal in canada the dough is so easy to work with and it makes the lightest yeast rolls i have n't used another white bread recipe since i started making this one -carrie ormsby west jordan utah sour cream cream
